name: Sweet Droplet
description:
No dream can come true without hard work!

The only thing an adventurer desires is the glory of murdering goblins and raiding their gold, but these dreams are not so easy to achieve, and glory takes effort. 

In Sweet Droplet, that effort becomes fun! So you -The Player- can enjoy both hard work and wish fullfilment at the same time!

Enjoy an RPG Clicker with a speck of realism, that challenges your conception of fantasy, reality and day to day activities.
